# Python






## basic



### import

```python
# matplotlib is also avaliable
import matplotlib.pyplot 

# you can only use matplotlib.pyplot, i.e., plt
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
from matplotlib import pyplot as plt
```


### setting

```{bash}
python3       -E -c 'import sys; print(sys.path)'
python3    -s -E -c 'import sys; print(sys.path)'
python3 -S -s -E -c 'import sys; print(sys.path)'
```




### tips

- check for PEP 8 compliance

```
py.test --pep8 main.py
```

- `matplotlib.pyplot.ion()` haves the advantages of working _outside_ of IPython as well
